languages.text: "Мы летаем с кем придется, в основном положившись на удачу. С кем на проезд в счет будущей добычи договариваемся, с кем еще как... Рисковое это дело, конечно. Лет пять тому одну бригаду отвезли на заброшенную станцию, а у них там что-то не заладилось с системами жизнеобеспечения. Прилетел корабль через два года — одни трупы".

"We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."
languages.original_text: "Мы летаем с кем придется, в основном положившись на удачу. С кем на проезд в счет будущей добычи договариваемся, с кем еще как... Рисковое это дело, конечно. Лет пять тому одну бригаду отвезли на заброшенную станцию, а у них там что-то не заладилось с системами жизнеобеспечения. Прилетел корабль через два года — одни трупы".

traits.locale_text: "We fly with whomever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we get a ride on the cuff and pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, they brought a crew to an abandoned station, and something wasn't right with the life support systems there. The ship came two years later — found nothing but bodies."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “我们能遇到谁，就上谁的船，大多数时间都是在碰运气。有时候我们会搭便车，答应船长会用今后找到的东西来支付报酬。还有的时候，我们会采取些别的手段……毫无疑问，这一行是有风险的。大概五年前，有一群人被送到了一座废弃的星站，但那里的生命维持系统出了问题。两年之后，那艘飞船回来接他们的时候，只看到了满地的尸体。”
languages.original_text: "We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."

traits.locale_text: “我们能遇到谁，就上谁的船，大多数时间都是在碰运气。有时候我们会搭便车，答应船长会用今后找到的东西来支付报酬。还有的时候，我们会采取些别的手段……毫无疑问，这一行是有风险的。大概五年前，有一群人被送到了一座废弃的星站，但那里的生命维持系统出了问题。两年之后，那艘飞船回来接他们的时候，只看到了满地的尸体。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Volamos con quien sea. Nos arriesgamos. Unas veces conseguimos transporte prometiendo que pagaremos con lo que encontremos, otras encontramos alguna otra forma... Es peligroso, claro. Hace cinco años o así, dejaron a una tripulación en una estación abandonada, pero algo falló en los sistemas de soporte vital. La nave volvió dos años después a recogerlos, pero solo encontró sus cadáveres».
languages.original_text: "We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Volamos con quien sea. Nos arriesgamos. Unas veces conseguimos transporte prometiendo que pagaremos con lo que encontremos, otras encontramos alguna otra forma... Es peligroso, claro. Hace cinco años o así, dejaron a una tripulación en una estación abandonada, pero algo falló en los sistemas de soporte vital. La nave volvió dos años después a recogerlos, pero solo encontró sus cadáveres».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「私たちは誰とでも飛びますが、ほとんどの場合、一か八かでやってるだけです。後で、私たちが見つけたものの代金で支払うという約束で乗せてもらう時もあれば、別の手段を見つける時もあります…明らかに危険なビジネスです。5年くらい前のことですが、クルーが廃駅で降ろされたものの、生命維持装置に異常があったようで、2年後に彼らを迎えに行ってみたら、発見されたのはクルーの死体だけでした」
languages.original_text: "We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは誰とでも飛びますが、ほとんどの場合、一か八かでやってるだけです。後で、私たちが見つけたものの代金で支払うという約束で乗せてもらう時もあれば、別の手段を見つける時もあります…明らかに危険なビジネスです。5年くらい前のことですが、クルーが廃駅で降ろされたものの、生命維持装置に異常があったようで、2年後に彼らを迎えに行ってみたら、発見されたのはクルーの死体だけでした」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Wir fliegen mit jedem mit und hoffen auf Glück. Manchmal versprechen wir, später mit unseren Funden zu bezahlen, manchmal finden wir andere Lösungen ... Natürlich ist das riskant. Vor etwa fünf Jahren wurde eine Crew in einer verlassenen Station abgesetzt, bei der die Lebenserhaltungssysteme nicht in Ordnung waren. Zwei Jahre später kam das Schiff zurück, um sie abzuholen, fand aber nur noch Leichen."
languages.original_text: "We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Wir fliegen mit jedem mit und hoffen auf Glück. Manchmal versprechen wir, später mit unseren Funden zu bezahlen, manchmal finden wir andere Lösungen ... Natürlich ist das riskant. Vor etwa fünf Jahren wurde eine Crew in einer verlassenen Station abgesetzt, bei der die Lebenserhaltungssysteme nicht in Ordnung waren. Zwei Jahre später kam das Schiff zurück, um sie abzuholen, fand aber nur noch Leichen."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « On voyage avec n'importe qui, au gré de nos rencontres. On peut embarquer sur un vaisseau en promettant de rémunérer son capitaine avec nos futures trouvailles, ou bien nous arranger autrement... Bref, c'est une activité périlleuse. Il y a environ cinq ans, une équipe a été déposée sur une station abandonnée, mais les systèmes de survie étaient défaillants. Quand le vaisseau est revenu les chercher deux ans plus tard, il ne restait plus que des cadavres. »
languages.original_text: "We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."

traits.locale_text: « On voyage avec n'importe qui, au gré de nos rencontres. On peut embarquer sur un vaisseau en promettant de rémunérer son capitaine avec nos futures trouvailles, ou bien nous arranger autrement... Bref, c'est une activité périlleuse. Il y a environ cinq ans, une équipe a été déposée sur une station abandonnée, mais les systèmes de survie étaient défaillants. Quand le vaisseau est revenu les chercher deux ans plus tard, il ne restait plus que des cadavres. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Canımızı dişimize takıp kimi bulursak onunla uçuyoruz. Bazen daha sonra bulduklarımızla borcumuzu öderiz diye söz verip bırakmalarını sağlıyoruz, bazen de başka bir yolunu buluyoruz... Riskli bir iş, orası kesin. Beş yıl kadar önceydi, bir ekibi terk edilmiş bir istasyonda bırakmışlar ama yaşam destek sisteminin bir sıkıntısı varmış. İki yıl sonra ekibi almaya bir gemi gelmiş ama sırf ölülerini bulmuş."
languages.original_text: "We fly with whoever, mostly just taking our chances. Sometimes we hitch a ride on the promise that we'll pay with what we find later, other times we find some other means... Risky business, obviously. Five or so years back, a crew got dropped off at an abandoned station, but something wasn't right with the life support systems. The ship came back to pick them up two years later, and found nothing but bodies."
